schema.prompt:
Analyze project scope for complexity assessment and task breakdown planning:

Project Description: {{input.projectDescription}}
Project Goals: {{input.projectGoals}}
Deliverables: {{input.deliverables}}
Constraints: {{input.constraints}}
Stakeholders: {{input.stakeholders}}

Perform comprehensive scope analysis:

1. Scope Dimensions:
   - Functional scope boundaries
   - Technical complexity levels
   - Resource requirements
   - Time horizon analysis
   - Quality standards

2. Complexity Assessment:
   - Technical complexity factors
   - Integration complexity
   - Stakeholder complexity
   - Process complexity
   - Risk complexity

3. Work Package Identification:
   - Major deliverable components
   - Logical work groupings
   - Dependency clusters
   - Skill-based packages
   - Timeline-based phases

4. Breakdown Structure Readiness:
   - Decomposition feasibility
   - Definition clarity
   - Estimation readiness
   - Assignment potential
   - Monitoring capability

5. Scope Risks:
   - Scope creep potential
   - Unclear requirements
   - Stakeholder alignment issues
   - Technical uncertainties
   - Resource availability

6. Interface Analysis:
   - Internal interfaces
   - External dependencies
   - System integrations
   - Stakeholder touchpoints
   - Process handoffs

7. Success Criteria Definition:
   - Acceptance criteria
   - Quality measures
   - Performance standards
   - Completion indicators
   - Value realization

8. Scope Management Framework:
   - Change control needs
   - Approval processes
   - Documentation requirements
   - Communication protocols
   - Review mechanisms

Return as structured JSON with keys: scopeDimensions (object), complexityAssessment (object), workPackages (array), breakdownReadiness (object), scopeRisks (array), interfaceAnalysis (object), successCriteria (object), managementFramework (object).
